import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TimeSheetService } from '../../services/time-sheet.service'; import { TimeSheet } from '../../models/timesheet'; import { TimeSheetEntry } from '../../models/TimeSheetEntry'; @Component({ selector: 'timesheet-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'] }) export class DetailsComponent implements OnInit{ @Input() timeSheetId:number |undefined; timeSheet:TimeSheetEntry |undefined; constructor(private timeSheetSvc:TimeSheetService){} ngOnInit(): void { } onReceiveTimeSheetId(event:any){ this.timeSheetId=selectedTimeSheetId; } }
